website_summaries.verdict: Bulkier than most competitors, but the memory foam affords excellent support and comfort.
pros: Efficient temperature regulation and consistent contoured support provided by the Memory Foam

customer_reviews.title: Five years use and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I feel inclined to write a review since my husband and I have been using these body pillows for five years now. We love them! We are not small people, and most cheap pillows weren’t comfy at all. You can really throw yourself on these. I’m 5’7, hubby is 5’11, and pillows are long enough to hug and have support your legs at the same time. They are very heavy so takes a little effort to move them around in bed. The pillow cases they come with are super soft and have maintained their quality with weekly washings for five years now. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Wandafoo

customer_reviews.title: Tired of buying new body pillows all the time and low back pain.  This is the pillow you need.  No more low back pain.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying body pillows that go flat in no time. My daughter got this as a gift from my aunt a few years ago and she loves it so I thought I would try it. I normally have a lot of low back pain so I always knew when it was time to replace my body pillow. I don't see that being an issue with this pillow. It's designed so that I don't think it will ever go flat. It has a memory foam core and around that is soft. I've not had one night of back pain since using this. I will be recommending this to my chiropractor and everyone I meet.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great body pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great body pillow. You will need to work/knead the foam chunks that make up the inside of this body pillow in order to evenly distribute the foam, and occasionally to "loft" it back up as the foam can travel over time and use. Yes, it's a bit on the heavy side, so those who tend to turn left and right over the night will need to swing this husky thing around.
customer_reviews.author: Tome Trajkovski

customer_reviews.title: perfect for pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Responding to some reviews, it's NOT that big but it IS that heavy. a whopping 10lbs, which is something I can appreciate for the price. And it's quite lofty, but nothing extraordinary that makes you think you're purchasing a cadillac-size pillow. Agree, because of the memory foam, it does trap heat, so you will feel as if you're snuggling more with another human being than a pillow, so dress lightly if you use this at bedtime so you don't sweat. After pregnancy, this converts perfectly to a main pillow on a guest bed. love the versatility of that compared to buying an actual "pregnancy" that has little function after its use. hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mum

customer_reviews.title: Huge, heavy, soft, lumpy, not solid memory foam
customer_reviews.text: First let me say this pillow weights more than a bag of bricks! There are ups and downs to this. It does stay in place and is immobile at night, but its a struggle to adjust and move. It is comforable but DO NOT BE FOOLED this is not a solid memory foam pillow, it is a pillow filled with chunks of memory foam so it can feel a little lumpy. The pillow case it comes with though is one of the softest materials I have ever felt! Its amazing. If you want a memory foam pillow (genuinely) then dont but this pillow, if you want a big, soft heavy pillow buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: This body pillow is amazing for my bad back
customer_reviews.text: This body pillow is amazing for my bad back. After months it hasn’t flattened. I hate leaving town without my pillow! It is heavy but I just move myself instead of the pillow and the case is super soft. Wish they sold those too (it came with it). Worth every penny. I kept having to buy one every few months when they got too flat. Not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sassydawnb

customer_reviews.title: I bought a recommend pillow case from the pillow product page and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these pillows for my girlfriend and another for me. My girlfriend is a side sleeper and cuddles with this pillow. I tend to roam the bed. This pillow helps keep me in place. This is a very large pillow. Finding pillow cases that fit it can be difficult. I bought a recommend pillow case from the pillow product page and I couldn't even get it to stretch over the end of the pillow. Trial and error may be your best bet. A little pillow punching will move the foam pieces around if it ever gets lean in a given spot. Nothing unusual there.
customer_reviews.author: Hedley Lamarr

customer_reviews.title: Large and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This body pillow is too large and heavy for my taste. It's like having another person in the bed! If you're someone who flips from one side to another you'll have your work cut out for you to maneuver this pillow while switching sides. I find the Pinzon Body Pillow a lot easier to handle and more comfortable for sleeping. However, the pillow case that comes with this body pillow is extremely soft. I wish they sold the case separately--I'd buy several. I've been using this pillow as a bolster under my knees when laying on my back. It's perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon Bark

customer_reviews.title: it's okay
customer_reviews.text: I think this pillow is okay. It's not super comfortable or anything but it's nice. I expected a better pillow. My main dislike is that it feels cheaply made. It's the size of 2 pillows next to each other (the long way). To let you know what I mean by cheaply made, it has a zipper, if you unzip the zipper, you see the memory foam part of the pillow. The pillow is just 1 bigger rectangle cotton pillow folded around the memory foam, then zipped up. It just didn't meet my expectations, but i still like it. I paid $45 for and but I think it only feels like it should be worth $20.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: An answer to my sleeping dilemma.
customer_reviews.text: I could use a pillow that is a little longer but I don't think they make them any longer. Because of the foam, the pillow is heavy and the reason I got the pillow is because I have a back issue. It's weight makes it a little difficult for me to move it during the night when I want to turn over. Still, I love it. It stays firm enough for my knees and arms, but also gives to cradle them. The case that comes with it is impossibly soft and comfortable. I bought a different case only because I keep the pillow on the bed and wanted something that would match my bedding better.
customer_reviews.author: Ice

customer_reviews.title: Best Body Pillow I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Usually do not write reveiws but thought others would find this helpful. Bought and returned (4) body pillows before I found this one. The others I purchased would compress to the point where they offered little to no support. As a 235 lb 6'0 person, support was very important to me. I am a side sleeper. This item has an inner memory foam pillow that is contained within an outer layer cover. In addition, it comes with a quality outer pillow cover that is very soft to the touch and washable. It ofers superb support and gives me the comfort I desire. You will not be dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but...
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, I really like this body pillow because it has helped ease some of the back pain I get when I sleep with regular pillows, but I don't like the fact that the filling of the pillow bunches up in some sections and doesn't always return to its form. I end up having to fluff this massive and heavy pillow each day to ensure support for my body. As I said, it is heavy, which I don't necessarily mind because it usually keeps me anchored from tossing and turning all night, but having to fluff it is when the weight is too much. Other than that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Body Pillow EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I have prior ankle and knee Injuries from playing high school and college sports. Does not help that I am on my feet 10-12 hrs per day. This offers great support for my knees and ankles finally I can sleep at night. Pillow case is very soft. It comes packed tightly and takes some manipulating to distribute the foam. Finally I threw in dryer for 15 mins, came out prefect.
customer_reviews.author: Cl

customer_reviews.title: Best body pillow I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best body pillow I have ever used. I have tried multiple pillows from multiple companies and they are either too flat or fall apart quickly. This pillow is just the right thickness and has never gone flat. I can't live without this pillow. I pray they never stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: Bear's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is big and just what I was looking for! if your are a small person i would not recommend this as it is pretty heavy but for me its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Just like most people who have left a review stating the numerous body pillows they have went through, this is definitely THE best body pillow out there!!! Although rather very thick and find myself having to "climb" the pillow to get my left leg up, I still manage to sleep like a baby and have less back pain! The pillow case is super soft and has a cool feeling to it, which helps me to go to sleep. I love using my hand to rub against the fabric. Again, super soft! I highly recommend this pillow and seller was definitely prompt with shipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Luvlytrinity

customer_reviews.title: heavy but does the job
customer_reviews.text: my husband is 6'6" and he is tall and average build. He rotates sides constantly through the night while sleeping. i bought him a body pillow at target, it did not do the job bc it was too thin and lifeless. This memory foam body pillow is amazing. it is on the heavy side, but it really keeps shape and he a very large person and it holds up to his use. He LOVES it and has had much better sleep bc of it. i think for a smaller person you may not need such a dense pillow, but perhaps a heavier person would prefer something if this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, this is a heavy pillow, and personally, I like it. It can take a beating and still works as intended. When the package arrived, I took the pillow out to find it was quite lumpy from being crammed into a smaller package. I simply unzipped the pillow casing, took out the inner part and laid it flat on the floor. At this point I walked on it, and broke the clumps up until it was evened out across the pillow. Putting it back together, I enjoyed the first of many nights of sleep with it cushioning me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Insanely comfortable to sleep on, no weird smell
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my son for Christmas and he's stopped using regular pillows now because it's so comfortable. I stole a quick nap on it and am planning to buy one for myself soon-it's crazy comfortable. No weird odor like so many memory foam products, either, which is a definite plus because they normally have to air out for a day or three before they stop smelling strange.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great Stability. Keeps Hips in-Line With Spine.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is amazing. It is super heavy, so it doesn’t squash down to nothing as soon as I lay with it on my side. I’ve had two back surgeries and need good support for side sleeping. I wake up now with absolutely no hip pain from them rolling forward of (and out of line with) my spine as I used to due to a flimsy non-supportive body pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kapok

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is the BOMB!!! I bought during a recent pregnancy. Even though I'm no longer pregnant, I can't sleep well without this pillow! The pillow was a bit clumpy straight out of the box, but it filled out everywhere after a few nights. The cover is SO soft and the pillow truly conforms to my body. I am considering purchasing another for my husband! What a great product!! Thank you Sleep Innovations!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn W

customer_reviews.title: Too big for maternity pillow
customer_reviews.text: Too big for a maternity pillow for me. This is a grand daddy of body pillows, and kind of like sleeping while spooning a very large man (covered in fabric, lol). No way would this provide me belly and leg support that I needed during pregnancy. So back it goes. I got this as well as the Safra memory foam u-shaped pillow to see which design worked for me. I want to lie in the u shaped one all day, and it's perfect. Recommend giving that a try if you want maternity support
customer_reviews.author: redhed

customer_reviews.title: Too large and too firm
customer_reviews.text: Have to be honest that these body pillows are HUGE and REALLY firm. I bought two to use on each side of my body to ensure I would not roll over on my side after some surgery. I have a queen size bed but two were overwhelming. It's like an entire person laying next to you and it's not soft. I would stick with a body pillow without memory foam if I ever did this again. I had to give both of these away. Perhaps it's my fault for not reading reviews on this fully but for me I could not rate it any higher.
customer_reviews.author: netkat

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly great quality
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is more like pieces of memory foam stuffed into a pillow case which makes it clumpy. It took almost an hour of fluffing, and pounding to get most of the clumps out, but you will never get them all. The pillow is alright for lounging and watching TV but I wouldn't recommend it for a pillow you sleep on. Also beware that the pillow is very heavy, so it won't be easy to maneuver around at night, and/or if you are a small person.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nieski

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable body pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is my first memory foam body pillow and I love it. It is a bit heavier than I'd like it to be. Alittle difficult to roll over and change sides when getting settled, but it is the most comfortable and conforming body pillow I have ever owned .
customer_reviews.author: j.m

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my old body pillow. IN LOVE! Its a bit heavier than my old one but it holds up to snuggling very well. Hard to sleep without it now. Super comfy
customer_reviews.author: aniretakrace

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. It does not go flat over time like the typical cheaper ones do, and comes with a high quality pillowcase. However, it is VERY heavy for a pillow. Personally, I like this...but my girlfriend does not like it all. It's a matter of personal preference, but if heavy body pillow is what you're looking for it's a win. Update: This must be a larger than average body pillow, as many cases do not fit it. I'm stuck using the one that came with it, for lack of fitting replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Heaven wrapped
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so there's only one downside that I have found, and that this thing is HEAVY. But I still rated it with a 5 because well it's memory foam and that's known to be heavy, and this body pillow will last me A LONG TIME! I use one all the time, and the local store ones flatten out in no time. I decided to invest in this, and I'm so glad I did! I'm now 28 weeks pregnant and this is the only thing that has helped with sleeping issues. I LOVE LOVE LOVE this thing, and the heaviness doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesky6

customer_reviews.title: Best body pillow ever
customer_reviews.text: Other body pillows would get lumpy. I have had this one for 4 years now and it's still in great shape. I love it so much we cannot travel without it. When I was pregnant it worked great and I did not have to purchase another pillow. Also worked well for co-sleeping and breastfeeding while lying on my side. I love the pillow case that came with it and would love to have a couple spares. Can anyone tell me where to get purchase them?
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Godley

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is heavy- but that's what makes it hold up. It is perfect for a side sleeper with pain in joints and knees. I will never go back to a plain body pillow again. I thought it might take a night or two to get used to it ,as it is much thicker than any body pillow I've had , but that was not the case. The quality is great and the pillowcase that comes with it is very soft. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jnjr

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable body pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I buy one of these Memory Foam Body Pillows about once a year. They are the only pillows that I have found that last me around a year that actually makes me more comfortable while I sleep. I have chronic neck pain and it is hard for me to find a pillow that helps alleviate some of my pain. I have tried several other body pillows and none of them compares to the comfort of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: First body pillow
customer_reviews.text: As my first body pillow I have to say this is pretty good. I'm a side sleeper so putting this between my legs makes sleeping a whole lot better. it is pretty big, it's like having another person in bed with you. I have a full sized bed and still have enough room for me. I'm not sure how much more I can write about a pillow. It's just really nice, and not too soft nor is it too hard. It's just right. Be aware of the weight though. It is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Two pillows in one. . .
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pillow a couple weeks now and I have to say I like it a lot but I don't use it as intended. This pillow is WAY to big as is. I have taken the insert out but a cover on that and use it when I need really firm support and as far as the cover I stuffed a down body pillow into that making it pillow heaven. So for me this is really two body pillows and I really love but since I cannot use it as intended and how I hoped I am docking it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Cellanne2003

customer_reviews.title: Huge but great.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is truly a body. It weighs a lot. I'm a large man and I love it. It swallows my wife thou.
customer_reviews.author: CSK

customer_reviews.title: It's huge!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had knee replacement and was having a difficult time finding a comfortable sleeping position and I hoped this pillow would be the answer. Unfortunately, it was so big that it took up almost 1/3 of our queen-size bed and I had to move to the guest room. He thought at first it was helping, but after a couple of weeks, the pillow was banished to storage. I would look for something smaller next time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best body pillow ever! HANDS DOWN!
customer_reviews.text: I am IN LOVE with this body pillow. I tell every pregnant woman I know about it. I could't see spending insane amounts of money for a pillow specific to pregnancy. I did a lot of searching and reading of reviews and finally decided on this pillow. Purchased it about 20 weeks ago (at about 10 weeks pregnant) and have loved it since the beginning. So comfortable! Only complaint in the last 2 - 3 weeks is that, as I am getting more pregnant, I go to turn over in the night and have to of course switch the pillow to the other side and it is now starting to get heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Firm stable body support
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is firm and quite heavy. This is a plus in that it remains stable through the night and the dense composition of the pillow provides excellent full body support. I am 6' 4" and it fits me from upper chest to mid shin.
customer_reviews.author: Wray E. Holan

customer_reviews.title: It keeps its shape!
customer_reviews.text: I need a body pillow for another bed. This body pillow is heavy! It is not one to carry from room to room. But, it also keeps is shape. I have had a year. Just had back surgery, cannot sleep without it. Buying one to keep home and one to travel with (different rooms of house and driving trips, way to heavy to pack to fly with). You can wash cover but not pillow. Good barrier if your kids sleep with you.
customer_reviews.author: Wolff Den

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and very lumpy
customer_reviews.text: Got my body pillow the other day and for the first time in a long while I am super disappointed with a product. It has these large lumps of what feels like gel material throughout it that make it both really heavy and uncomfortable. I am getting ready for hip surgery and wake nearly every time I turn in bed right now. I told my husband it felt creepy like a body next to me as lumps did not adapt to my movements and was ridiculous to lift if I changed to sleep on my other side
customer_reviews.author: WC Vermont

customer_reviews.title: Heavy heavy heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend who loves to have a pillow between his knees to sleep. He likes this pillow ok, but wow, this is one heavy weight pillow! The other reviews referencing that its "like a body lying next to you" are just about right. It stays put for sure, but that makes it hard to roll over during the night. The larger size is nice. It is still fluffy. Great pillow though.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, easy to clean, awesome soft.
customer_reviews.text: I use this pillow for my bed when I am watching movies with a special someone in my bed. It is perfectly soft but still very firm to help with proper movie / tv watching posture and cuddling space. This is super easy to clean, but be warned it may be hard to find another pillowcase for this as it is super thick and I ruined a case trying to force the pillow in.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne Fisher

customer_reviews.title: This is a beast!  BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: FLUFFY! This thing is the extreme body pillow, not one of the wimpy flatter than a pancake in a week pillows.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Word ... Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of memory foam and this is an awesome memory foam pillow. It's big, long and wide, but that is one of the things I like. Alot of body pillows are skinny, but this one is a good width and very comfortable. I don't always use it as a body pillow, sometimes I use it as an extra long pillow for my head and it works great both ways. Very reasonably priced too, I plan on ordering another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: L. Marrott

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! I use to be a stomach sleeper and was putting a lot of strain on my lower back. After getting this pillow I've been able to train myself to sleep on my side. The pillow is pretty heavy but that makes it easier to sleep with. I've had other body pillows that were light and I would kick them off the bed. This one stay in place and I wake up in the same position I was in when I went to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Khaleasi

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this pillow but my girlfriend has significant gripes because ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pillow but my girlfriend has significant gripes because this thing is massive(size of an adult woman). It has held its firmness so far. I will update down the road
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vollenweider

customer_reviews.title: Hefty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a seriously heavy duty body pillow. The shipping label read 14lbs. Very supportive. Not easy to squeeze and flip with during the night though it can be done. It replaced a flat soft pillow for me. Works well, I no longer wake up with sore legs. High quality. If I had to choose again, my perfect pillow would have the same material but be a little lighter weight.
customer_reviews.author: RRoxy

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while pregnant, and it was way too heavy for me. Being a teacher I am on my feet all day, which left me with sore and swollen ankles at night. This pillow actually bothered them more because of the added weight. Gave it to my mother in law, who agreed it was heavy, but didn't make her warmer as it did me. If you heat up easily at night or are looking for lighter support, keep searching elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: LoraDora728

customer_reviews.title: not so great
customer_reviews.text: I tried it for two nights and it made me hot both nights. When it came it was heavy which was concerning & it felt hard in spots. I followed directions & did the fluffing but during the second night I pushed it out of bed & got my leg pillow. I was just too hot to sleep with it any longer & usually I am cold.
customer_reviews.author: nurse67

customer_reviews.title: I will say that this one is better than others I have purchased at department stores
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow for my husband because of his back problems. I will say that this one is better than others I have purchased at department stores, but that's not really saying much. It's a good size, and it's nice and heavy but it is also very lumpy and not really the comfort level I was hoping to get for him. I suppose that one that is solid memory foam and not pieces of memory foam would serve him better, but this one did not do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Collier

customer_reviews.title: Best Body Pillow Ever
customer_reviews.text: This body pillow is the perfect length, the perfect thickness and totally comfortable. The fact that it unzips for washing is also a great benefit. I have actually bought two of them and really love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Vossler

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very thick! So much support. Got it for my wife with back problems and she loves it. She can sleep at night now. No more pressure on hips and lower back. The pillow is pretty heavy. My wife is 5'4 and 108 lbs and its alittle hard to maneuver around. Its almost as big as she is lol. But a great pillow! I want one now...
customer_reviews.author: Armando B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Body Pillow or a Pillow to Keep at The Top of The Bed.
customer_reviews.text: I was sleeping with this as a body pillow for a while but now i like to keep it at the top of the bed. I had a problem where I would always knock the pillows off the bed and wake up because i had no pillow. Not with this one because it weighs like 10 lbs and it keeps you fully supported throughout the night. great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong, no flat spots
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many other body pillows & all of them go flat in a month, especially in the middle & no amount of fluffing gets it back in shape. I've had this pillow for a while & as long as I fluff it up occasionally (about every 2 weeks), it is stays full & firm. Be warned - it is very heavy, nothing like a standard pillow, but you get used to it after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaneanne

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is one heavy body pillow. It will certainly hold up over time since it's well made. If you're just looking for one to help with your side sleeping posture by keeping your spine in alignment and supporting your arm, then look elsewhere. This one is just too thick to be useful. If you need a pillow to replace a missing sleeping partner, then this one's for you.
customer_reviews.author: TerryE.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and solid, soft - helps me sleep and stay comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This has made a BIG difference in hip and knee pain for me - especially when I was training for first marathon. Please be aware that it is HEAVY! My wife calls it "Bertha" a but, Bertha does you right. I no longer toss and turn like before because I can use this pillow to keep me comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MrSoul

customer_reviews.title: Washing instructions
customer_reviews.text: To respond to aaa-Pam's concern about laundering - on the front package it says, unzip fiberfill outer cover. Remove inner memory foam center. Machine wash fiberfill outer cover in warm water with like colors. Memory foam Center not machine washable
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable and the right length for me (I'm nearly 5'8) ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm pregnant and have been using this product every night for the past several months. It's comfortable and the right length for me (I'm nearly 5'8) however it's very heavy!! Moving it around and changing the pillow case can feel like a workout!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow for support. Still works today, though a tad lumpy.
customer_reviews.author: AlouetteSK

customer_reviews.title: Trust me, this is AWESOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing body pillow!!!! If you are looking for a thick firm pillow this is for you. I have a lower back injury where I have no discs left and sleeping was miserable. Since getting this pillow it places my leg at the right height so my lower back doesn't twist. Yes, it is big and my husband jokes it's like having another body in the bed, however I'm sleeping through the night and don't have pain in the morning...so, this is a huge win for me. Do yourself a favor and spend the money, you won't regret it. FYI it comes with a case. Hope this helps...happy sleeping!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: this pillow is amazing! It is huge and soft
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and I must say as a woman that is slightly over 200 lb and a long user of body pillows, this pillow is amazing! It is huge and soft. LUXURIOUS! It is heavy, but since I've used a body pillow for many years it was no big deal to turn from side to side. The pillow case is super soft and I wish I could buy other bedding with the same material. If you are a body pillow enthusiast and have the room, I HIGHLY recommend this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great body pillow! Unlike many "body" pillows on the market, this one is actually long enough to comfortable fit the length of your body. It stays nice and puffy. Some people don't like that it's heavy, but it stays in my bed so that is the least of my worries. It has helped me a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: LIKE SNUGGLING WITH A PERSON!!
customer_reviews.text: This body pillow is HUGE!!! It looks like a person under the sheets in my bed. Super comfy to cuddle with!! Highly recommended! It is just very heavy to move around because of the density of the memory foam. Comes with a washable cover around the memory foam. Very happy with this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Best body pillow ever
customer_reviews.text: So the first time I received this pillow in the mail, it came without a pillow case. So I returned it for a replacement and received the replacement the next day....with the pillowcase. The pillow is waaayy more than I expected. Its very heavy, thick, and extremely comfortable. I was expecting a lot less, however, this pillow exceeded my expectations. It is literally a body pillow, not a thin, weak little pad that you lay next to. The pillow case is probably the softest pillow case that I have had the pleasure of owning. Well crafted. I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Extremely heavy!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pillow because I have MS and have to sleep with a body pillow. I am not weak (we have a farm) but this pillow kicks my butt when I try to roll over. The pillow is really nice but the weight is excessive!!
customer_reviews.author: TBJB

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, especially for bigger men.
customer_reviews.text: I truly feel this pillow has helped my back as well as more restful sleep. It's big, I'm big, it's heavy, I'm heavy, a match made it heaven. I would strongly recommend this pillow for big guys like myself (6'4", 300lbs)
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Gerjets

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but HEAVY.
customer_reviews.text: I often roll over in my sleep and like to roll my body pillow with me. It is a bit more challenging with this pillow. It is also very thick, which is nice for hugging, but a little big to put between legs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive price / quality
customer_reviews.text: I window shop many memory foam body pillows in a few weeks and find this one 2 be most likely the best choice. The day I got fell right to sleep on it really fast(good nap)... On thy other hand, not quite as memory foam'ish as my other 2 regular size pillows(but I love it and got mom 1)...
customer_reviews.author: michael procyk

customer_reviews.title: I'm already sleeping Better
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for four nights but already notice that I'm sleeping better. I'm not constantly adjusting my position to ease back, knee and neck pain. The best part is I don't have to worry about this one flatting out or becoming misshapen thanks to the memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very good for comfort after surgery
customer_reviews.text: This really helped me after surgery when I couldn't lie on my stomach directly. Using this body pillow allowed me to sleet on my stomach and side without pain. It's wonderful to use for a massage,too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: A quality pillow, not just a foam stuffed case.
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than you might expect, but that just means that it is not just some cheap foam stuffed pillow. This pillow really supports your weight without compressing into nothingness. Happy to see that it came with its own pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: Dagusia

customer_reviews.title: Not good for pregnancy.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very firm, holds shape well. Cons: way too thick to be comfortable. This pillow caused massive back and hip issues that have taken almost 3 weeks to semi-resolve. NOT a good pillow to use while pregnant, as it throws everything even more out of alignment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO THE BODY A FAVOR AND BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is the best body pillow I have ever had in my life! Its soft yet substantial and silky texture to it. I will probably buy these for Christmas presents this year its just that fabulous... everyone will love me!
customer_reviews.author: Safirblu

customer_reviews.title: Helps you find that comfortable position when you are not sleeping well
customer_reviews.text: This is a very big pillow. So bit that it will not fit into an average body body pillow cover. But just like any other memory foam pillow this one contours your shape and making it easy to get comfortable. I use this pillow every night
customer_reviews.author: TommyBear

customer_reviews.title: My husband has a bad back and needs a good pillow when he sleeps ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a bad back and needs a good pillow when he sleeps on his side. I was very surprised To see how firm this pillow really was when I received it. My husband loves it and couldn't find anything to complain about.... Thank to all the people who previously wrote a review as it help with my decision to but this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stumpf

customer_reviews.title: Best Body Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Over the course of the years, I have gone through dozens of body pillows in the search of the perfect one. If your like me and are buying a body pillow to cuddle up to at night, I highly recommend this pillow. In fact, my search is over as this is the best body pillow I have found . Like other reviewers have commented, it does have a weight and firmness to it. But this is what makes it perfect for hugging while keeping form.
customer_reviews.author: MN Boulevard

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly and HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best! It's HUGE but it conforms so well! I've even put it inbetween my husband pillow to get a good arch. You can remove the insert and just use that part of the pillow as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Horner

customer_reviews.title: Greatest body pillow ever
customer_reviews.text: Greatest body pillow ever! I've had others that I paid just as much for, but this pillow is amazing. It is heavy, but it doesn't just collapse under the weight of my leg like the others
customer_reviews.author: gavey

customer_reviews.title: This is a great body pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a great body pillow! Since the inner stuffing comes as two compacted hard pillows but is supposed to be loose memory foam fill, be sure to "tear" it apart; it's really easy and seems like that's what's meant to be done.
customer_reviews.author: CAZ

customer_reviews.title: Good body pillow
customer_reviews.text: We use a body pillow at all times underneath our own pillows for extra support. The last one was nearly 20 years old and was completely worn out. This has been a MAJOR upgrade. Holds its shape very well and provides the firmness we want out the bottom pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: And it won't smoosh flat like the last one I bought
customer_reviews.text: It's powerful Big! But it does the job of relieving stress on my back and hip. And it won't smoosh flat like the last one I bought. Not light enough to flip over easily if you turn over.
customer_reviews.author: John Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed my purchase of this pillow. The pillowcase is so soft and the support I get helps me sleep. I have a new knee replacement and arthritis in my spine, I find this pillow very helpful in relieving pain and I am getting a more restful sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Sarabent

customer_reviews.title: He has a bad back and has used several body pillows in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He has a bad back and has used several body pillows in the past and has found them to break down quickly. He is very pleased with this one so far. It gives him the support that he needs. I ordered this pillow on the 19th of Dec. and got it on the 22nd. so I was able to give him this for Christmas. I was very pleased on how well it was packed. I would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a body pillow several Christmas's ago for my husband from sleep number. Problem with it was it did not keep it's shape, would go flat. Love this purchase I made! Great quality and comfort, and best of all does not lose it's fullness.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: My first body pillow was $10, from Target.... that was a good way to see if I would like one, but a poor investment long term. I LOVE this pillow! The memory foam in the middle gives it a nice heavy core and it has a supper soft outside shell. As a bonus, it comes with a pillow case. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Bradley

customer_reviews.title: I kept it because I like using it as a backrest and because the case ...
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy and awkward to move around when one is laying down. I kept it because I like using it as a backrest and because the case it comes with is the softest, silkiest cotton. I wish I could get sheets just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D

customer_reviews.title: A Good Idea
customer_reviews.text: The body pillow is a good idea-if you sleep alone in a king-sized bed with other pillows. Everybody else will be cramped. It is also very hot--you wake up sweating. On a positive side-the cats (both of them) just loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Rock

customer_reviews.title: Too HEAVY and too THICK!
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't so much of a hassle, I would return this body pillow. It is way too heavy and way too thick. I haven't been able to use it at all. The only positive thing I can say, is it's made well out of nice soft fabric, but that doesn't matter when you can't use it...
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I expected but nice....
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is much heavier than I imagined and the memory foam is " bunchy" . Its not at all like other memory foam pillows I have. However, it is nice and long and the pillow case is beautiful, feels and looks great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathyanne Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, the most comfortable pillow ever. The support of memory foam with the comfort of a regular fluffy pillow. Also, the pillowcase that comes with it is extremely soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome body pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this as one of two Christmas gifts for my woman. She absolutely loved it! Furthermore, she shares my view that a good heavy body pillow is a plus, not a negative; it just means it's a higher quality pillow than most and may keep it's fluff/durability longer. I mean, why do you need to be lugging this thing around with you in different places of the house anyway? Last I checked, a body pillow is meant to be used in your bed, something to snuggle up to even. If you want something light to carry around the house with you for some odd reason, get a regular pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M Baker

customer_reviews.title: best body pillow ever
customer_reviews.text: love it, its so comfortable. when it arrives its pretty stiff from shipping. you just have to roll it and fluff it to loosen all the things up and then its amazing. highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Mule girl

customer_reviews.title: Changing the pillow case is like weight-lifting.
customer_reviews.text: This is certainly a well made pillow, but it is so heavy, big and un-wielding. I'm unable to rest my leg on it comfortably; feels a bit like the great wall of China between me and my hubby :)
customer_reviews.author: Biggest Fan

customer_reviews.title: The best EVER
customer_reviews.text: I love this body pillow. I have used a body pillow for several years now and this is my favorite one. It is very large (about the size of another person in the bed!), and very heavy, but holds its shape very well. The pillow case is very soft that it comes with. I would highly reccommend this to anyone who wants a large, firm body pillow.
customer_reviews.author: cbiz

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! It's big and heavy, so if you want one you can move easily and quickly, don't pick this one. But, this is one the comfiest body pillow ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Deterling

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow, but it is NOT memory foam
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pillow, but it is NOT "memory foam." Now I have to add words, but there is nothing more to say...THIS pillow is NOT memory foam, it is cotton bunting, same as any other pillow from Kmart, just bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy & dense
customer_reviews.text: I found this pillow very dense and not formable, much heavier than other "gel foam" pillows. It's heavy enough that my arm goes to sleep under it which makes it less useful. Probably a better fit for a larger person.
customer_reviews.author: Moggadeet

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It is not what you would expect a memory foam pillow to be. There is a strange center price of foam on the inside with regular pillow material on the outside. I expected it to be entirely made of foam.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: I love the way this pillow feels
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this pillow feels. I am a side sleeper and I love to have a pillow between my legs for support and I also love to have something to lay my arm on and this pillow covers both. Only complaint is the pillow is heavy, but it is memory foam so that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: you can curve it and bend it so it is great. Well made
customer_reviews.text: HUGE..... a king bed a must... you can curve it and bend it so it is great. Well made ... nice pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: p. graham

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?!
customer_reviews.text: This is quite heavy. If you roll over with it in the night, you may irritate your bed partner when you accidentally club them with it. It's like hugging a giant tube of toothpaste. Very squeezy. The core of this pillow is memory foam pieces, not a solid foam core. When it arrives, the pillow is folded in half. One side of mine was extremely hard. After unzipping the pillow and redistributing the foam pieces inside their protective sleeve, the pillow was ready for action. I love this pillow so much and don't miss my crappy Target special of flatness at all.
customer_reviews.author: LadyPelinore

product_meta.title: Sleep Innovations Embrace Memory Foam Body Pillow with Hypoallergenic Cover, Made in The USA with a 5-Year Warranty
product_meta.description: Get huggable comfort and gentle support anywhere your body needs it – between your knees, along your back, behind your neck, or anywhere. This memory foam body pillow is designed for anyone who needs improved rest, relief and relaxation. Soft fiber-filled removable cover surrounds cradling memory foam for total body comfort and deep sleep. Includes bonus soft pillowcase.
feature_bullets: HYPOALLERGENIC PILLOW: The memory foam pillow for sleeping is designed with a wonderfully soft hypoallergenic microfiber cover that can easily be removed so it can be washed and dried. It also includes a bonus soft pillowcase.
MEMORY FOAM: This memory foam body pillow is designed for anyone who needs improved rest, relief and relaxation and is perfect for expectant mothers & maternity support.
COMFORT & SUPPORT: Get huggable comfort and gentle support everywhere your body needs it: between your knees, along your back, behind your neck or anywhere.
MADE IN THE USA: The foam for our bed pillows is proudly made in the USA and comes with a 5 year warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars679 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
